snippet: Rick Santorum continues to battle Mitt Romney despite Republican calls to coalesce around one candidate to defeat President Obama. Jeff Zeleny reports.
abstract: Rick Santorum continues to battle Mitt Romney despite Republican calls to coalesce around one candidate to defeat President Obama. Jeff Zeleny reports.
lead_paragraph: Rick Santorum continues to battle Mitt Romney despite Republican calls to coalesce around one candidate to defeat President Obama. Jeff Zeleny reports.
